release dates: USA::15 February 2014                            (New York City, New York)
locations: New York City, New York, USA::(studio)
imdb.plot outline: The world, as we know it, is coming to an end. Without any warning or explanation, America is suddenly destroyed by meteors...and submerged in lava from an erupting volcano...and attacked by aliens, swarmed by zombies, overrun by robots, nuked, infected with a deadly virus, and ravaged by the worst of Mother Nature. The Apocalypse - many apocalypses, actually - is finally upon us. While most of the country is wiped out, a few strong, resilient individuals survive. These people, though they seem unlikely heroes, must find their ways to each other through unimaginable perils, and must band together if they hope to survive. Ranging from a 12-year-old social media starlet to a 56-year old CEO, this ragtag group must not only learn how to survive in this dangerous, confusing, post-apocalyptic world, but must learn how to trust each other and work together. But in the face of such tragedy and loss, will they be able to survive? Or will they simply become victims of the Apocalypse?
imdb.title: The Apocalypse Survival Guide
plot: Eight strangers are each affected by different disasters, and must band together in order to survive what they quickly come to realize is the Apocalypse.::Anonymous

The world, as we know it, is coming to an end. Ranging from a 12-year-old social media starlet to a 56-year old CEO, this ragtag group must not only learn how to survive in this dangerous, confusing, post-apocalyptic world, but must learn how to trust each other and work together.
